column1: #Make sure that this file in encoded in ANSI

column2: The Brotherhood of the Everlasting is perhaps the largest group of holy slayers in Zakhara. They are elite assassins who mete out justice based on a specific set of principles and beliefs. Members are utterly devoted to the organization, and they're expected to sacrifice their lives if called upon to do so.
The Grandfather or Grandmother is a highly revered member that leads the Brotherhood with absolute authority.

column1: #For tooltip that require being a member

column2: Is a member of the Everlasting.

Do you have the courage to serve the Everlasting, the dedicated servants of the justice and vengeance of Hajama? The challenges are great, and secrecy is of the utmost importance. But wherever there is corruption and vice, the Everlasting will be there. Are you with us?
It is my duty and my pleasure to serve.
This path is not for me.
Adherents are the Brotherhood's fresh recruits.
Companions are members that have proven their worth to the Brotherhood.
Propagandists organize the bulk of the Brotherhood's activities, under the watchful eye of the Grandfather.
The Grandfather or Grandmother is a highly revered member that leads the Brotherhood with absolute authority.
